message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $18,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, and this is a fair opening price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $14,000 for the product.
